text: I am a foreigner who works near by in the science park. This is a simple salad bar. But it is fresh and tastes really good! They are serious about delivering a high quality meal.  In some ways this is my favorite place in all of a Singapore to eat. I might cry like a baby if they ever close. Hope more food centers in Singapore can open this type of natural, healthy food and sell it at a good value!!!

Not sure why this place doesnt have reviews, its quite good! For $5.80 you get chicken thigh, brown rice, corn, broccoli, lettuce and some thai chili sauce. Probably the longest line in the food court at lunch time. Well done!
Very delicious and healthy food , price reasonable,
Tasty and delicious, plenty of options for all types of diet at a very affordable price. Friendly auntie too
Amazing Good Wholesome Food At good pricing!
